alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Northern Erie; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 4:02PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Rain and snow showers with strong winds along a cold front will impact portions of northern Portage, Trumbull, Geauga, northern Medina, Cuyahoga, Lake, northern Summit, Lorain, Ashtabula, Erie and Crawford Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking rain and snow showers with gusty winds along a line extending from near Erie to near Vermilion. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 mph and visibility as low as half a mile where rain changes to snow. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Fluctuating visibility where rain is mixed with or changes to snow. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Erie, Lorain, Elyria, Warren, Painesville, Ashtabula, Willowick, Meadville, Conneaut, Ravenna, Vermilion, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls and Euclid. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Motorists should be prepared for changeable visibility.
